text:
"... although I am not a white nationalist, I am not exactly allergic to the stuff ..."
Very creepy that attitudes like this are thought to be wildly extreme. In fact, it's a  comforting sign of overall balance that there are people who think like this.
The rule here, I think, is Ds are the party of slavery whenever slavery is actually happening.
Worst thing, though, is that almost all the intelligence that does concretely exist is knotted into self-annulling homeostatic circuits, in order to prevent it doing anything wild.
Weed plantation-based neo-slavery is the hippest social model actually possible. Progress led inexorably to this. zerohedge.com/political/forcâ€¦
... "Is this good for the weed plantation slaver estates?" is the only question the contemporary left intelligentsia is serious about asking.

Rightists: "Are leftists evil, or are they idiots?"
Leftists: "If we call the evil rightists idiots it will annoy them more."
Rightists: "So more evil than idiotic then."
Training, not programming. Roughly what's happening in higher education generally.
... It will eventually break down in the same way, too.
"They hated Jews for being vaguely normal" is the drop and duck take here.
"Grok has now advanced to graduate-level ass-covering."
Should still do it though. Breaking-out from the bad equilibrium is worth a lot of pain.
They suddenly love human nature when it's not about the radical political urgency of molesting little kids.
This is true. Roll-up the pedo networks thoroughly enough and you get a full-spectrum right-wing counter-revolution for free. (MAGA should try this more enthusiastically.)
Prove you don't know anything about postmodernism without mentioning postmodernism.
